definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The shipping charges for returning samples will be added to your final invoice.
sentences.chinese: 運費爲返回的樣品將增加來您最後的發貨票。

sentences.english: Result Determin the best prescription approach and prepare the samples.
sentences.chinese: 結果確定處方最佳工藝並製備樣品。

sentences.english: Does the supplier have adequate equipment and facilities for performing ISIR's?
sentences.chinese: 供應商是否有足夠的設備進行樣品檢驗？

sentences.english: For biological products, samples from several consecutively manufactured batches should be submitted.
sentences.chinese: 對於生物製品，應當要提交連續幾個生產批次的樣品。

sentences.english: What Chastain was wearing was, in fact, a prototype for the Nike Inner Actives range of sports underwear.
sentences.chinese: 其實，查斯頓穿的是耐克運動內衣系列的樣品。

sentences.english: The re-inspection will only be conducted to the sampled samples the re-inspection result shall be final.
sentences.chinese: 複驗只對抽取留存的樣品，複驗結果爲最終依據。

sentences.english: The monitoring system samples stack gas at a rate proportional to the stack gas volumetric flow rate.
sentences.chinese: 煙道氣樣品的監控系統速率成正比的煙氣體積流量。

sentences.english: Please have a look at those samples.
sentences.chinese: 請給我望一上這些樣品。

sentences.english: The physical and chemical properties of the carbon black are detected, and its microstructure is analysed by High Revolution Electromicroscopy (HREM) and X-ray Diffraction.
sentences.chinese: 射線衍射和高分辨率透射電鏡分析了樣品的微觀結構。

sentences.english: Figure 3. A sample customized menu of favorite commands.
sentences.chinese: 圖形⒊一個定製喜愛命令的菜單樣品。

sentences.english: Doing so would help prevent the sample from becoming unnecessarily moist.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做會有助於阻止樣品不必要的受潮。

sentences.english: The bath also performs general laboratory applications, such as incubation and sample tempering.
sentences.chinese: 浴槽也可用於如孵育和樣品保溫等類常規實驗。

sentences.english: The results of two three-ply samples calculated by this method are in good agreement with experimental data.
sentences.chinese: 給出的兩個三層樣品的計算結果與實驗值符合得很好。

sentences.english: The goods submitted do not corresppond with the sample sent.
sentences.chinese: 到貨與惠送樣品並不相同。

sentences.english: A specimen which is much thicker than the penetration depth decays exponentially.
sentences.chinese: 一個比穿深透度厚得多的樣品，按指數律衰減。

sentences.english: A multi-station rotary sample stage is disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 一種多工位旋轉樣品臺。

definition: to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to cross the limit/to be over the accepted norm/excessive
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
to detect/to examine and discover/to sense
